title: Climb for the top
brief_description: Shows a team of mountain climbers preparing for and actually climbing Mt McKinley, the highest point in North America. Members discuss the elements of teamwork that are necessary to make it to the top. Narration by Sandy Fidell, Jeannie Rose, Don Lauria.
